name: Trafiklab
desc: Open APIs for all public transport in Sweden

name: SLU National Forest Inventory
desc: Official agricultural statistics about the status and change in Sweden's forests

name: Police Data (Polisens Öppna Data)
desc: Information about police stations, addresses and opening times

name: Statistika Centralbyrån
desc: Official data and statistics about the Swedish population, business, environment and more

name: Open Data Portal (Öppna Data)
desc: Open data portal containing information and endpoints for accessing several public data pools about society, business, transport, economy and more

name: SGU Geochemistry (Geokemi)
desc: Collection of geochemical data, maps, minerals and statistics

name: SGU Groundwater (Grundvatten)
desc: Collection of data about the groundwater in Sweden including water quality, water levels and time series

name: SGU Soils (Jordarter)
desc: Collection of data about soil types and their occurrences in Sweden

name: SGU Marine Geology (Maringeologi)
desc: Collection of marine geology data with maps, minerals and statistics

name: SGU Environment (Miljö)
desc: Collection of environmental data representing SGU's working areas

name: National Board of Health and Welfare
desc: Provides data about the Swedish health system and different statistics
